Subskills.name: Breeze
Subskills.description: Decreases movement diminish when using cloud of sand.

Subskills.name: Desert's Spirit
Subskills.description: Increases cast rate when using cloud of sand.

Subskills.name: Cloud Bender
Subskills.description: The cloud is now under your control gaining increased size and damage.

Subskills.name: Sand Twisters
Subskills.description: Teleporting into the cloud now unleashes multiple sand tornados around the cloud.

Subskills.name: Desert's Will
Subskills.description: Decreases mana cost when using cloud of sand.

Subskills.name: Desert's Endurance
Subskills.description: Increases the duration of cloud of sand.

Subskills.name: Sandbender
Subskills.description: Cloud of sand now leaves behind a trail of tornados.

Subskills.name: Zephyr
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of cloud of sand.

Subskills.name: Ascension
Subskills.description: Teleporting to the cloud now renders you immortal for a short period. Cloud of sand now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Heavy Sand
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by cloud of sand.

Subskills.name: Dust Storm
Subskills.description: Increases the size of cloud of sand.

Subskills.name: Field of Quicksand
Subskills.description: Teleporting to the cloud now summons multiple small sand vortexes around it.

Subskills.name: Desert's Echo
Subskills.description: Summon multiple clouds dealing increased damage. You are no longer able to teleport into the cloud.
